General.Name: Assems Inc.
General.Description: Assems Inc. develops, produces, and sells film adhesives for foam and material, and material and material adhesion in South Korea and internationally. It offers hot-melt films; and double-layer films. The company also provides coated yarns and hotmelt textile products; and sample laminating and coating machines, as well as U-WEB, an air-permeable lamination sheet. Its products are used in various applications, including footwear, textiles, garments, automotive, leather, industrial, military defense, luggage, household, and others. Assems Inc. was founded in 2003 and is based in Busan, South Korea.
